info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pender County... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wards Corner, or just west of Burgaw, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Murray Town and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 394 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
